pages.text: As the first drop touched your lips, it already filled your body with immense might. Just the memory of it makes your hand $(italic)tremble$() of tension. That's no good.$(br)And yet you have never felt more powerful and alive than you did at this very moment.$(br)However, is it really worth emptying that vial? Should you die against all odds, the price will be immense.
$(br)$(italic)Caress the one,$(br) the never-fading$(br)Rain in your heart,$(br)  the tears of$(br)  snow-white sorrow$(br)Caress the one,$(br)  the hiding amaranth$(br)In a land of the daybreak
